original_text: Then answered all the wicked men and men of Belial, of those that went with David, and said, Because they went not with us, we will not give them ought of the spoil that we have recovered, save to every man his wife and his children, that they may lead them away, and depart.
korean_text: 다윗과 함께 갔던 자들 가운데 악한 자와 불량배들이 다 이르되 그들이 우리와 함께 가지 아니하였은즉 우리가 도로 찾은 물건은 무엇이든지 그들에게 주지 말고 각자의 처자만 데리고 떠나가게 하라 하는지라

sentences.original_text: Then answered all the wicked men
of those that went with David
Because they went not with us
we will not give them ought
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그들에게 아무것도 주지 않을 것이라

sentences.original_text: of the spoil that we have recovered
save to every man his wife
that they may lead them away
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들을 이끌고 가게 하려 함이라
